_itemEE_ _itemEF_ _itemF0_ _itemF1_ _itemF2_ _itemF3_ _itemF4_ _itemF5_ _itemF6_ _itemF7_ _itemF8_ _itemF9_ _itemFA_ _itemFB_ _itemFC_ _itemFD_][87 FF]^itemempty^[00 FF]
BEFORE CHANGING, CONSIDER:
- In context, a double-space or bullet will precede the item name. The item must not be wide enough for the bullet to push it out of the available render area.
- Similarly, an item name is generally followed by a period or question mark.
- In the Saturn font, H extends slightly beyond its "width" in terms of letter spacing. This may yield undesirable rendering off the window, even when a line is green.
Items that are okay as-is vvvv[00 FF]
